sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_a041a63bdba03300e6aeab7dca961916
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>u_mass_mail</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Mass Mail - Generate Users</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {
	
	//Build Users
	var users = "";
	var userArray = [];
	if (!gs.nil(current.u_to.user)){
		users += current.u_to.user.split(',') + ",";
	}
	gs.log("Nikhil" + users);
	
	//Build Users from Groups
	var grGetGroupUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_grmember');
	grGetGroupUsers.addActiveQuery();
	grGetGroupUsers.addQuery('group','IN',current.u_to.group.split(','));
	grGetGroupUsers.query();
	
	while (grGetGroupUsers.next()) {
		userArray.push(grGetGroupUsers.user.sys_id.toString());
	}
	
	gs.log("Nikhil 2nd" + userArray.length)
	
	//Build Users from Roles
	var grGetRoleUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user_has_role');
	grGetRoleUsers.addActiveQuery();
	grGetRoleUsers.addQuery('role','IN',current.u_to.role.split(','));
	grGetRoleUsers.query();
	
	while (grGetRoleUsers.next()) {
		userArray.push(grGetGroupUsers.user.sys_id.toString());
	}
	gs.log("Nikhil 3rd" + userArray.length)
	
	//Build Users from Companies
	var grGetCLDUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	grGetCLDUsers.addActiveQuery();
	grGetCLDUsers.addQuery('company','IN',current.u_to.company.split(','));
	grGetCLDUsers.query();
	
	while (grGetCLDUsers.next()) {
		userArray.push(grGetCLDUsers.getValue('sys_id'));
	}
	
	//Build Users from Locations
	var grGetLocUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	grGetLocUsers.addActiveQuery();
	grGetLocUsers.addQuery('location','IN',current.u_to.location.split(','));
	grGetLocUsers.query();
	
	while (grGetLocUsers.next()) {
		userArray.push(grGetLocUsers.getValue('sys_id'));
	}
	
	//Build Users from Departments
	var grGetDepUsers = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	grGetDepUsers.addActiveQuery();
	grGetDepUsers.addQuery('department','IN',current.u_to.department.split(','));
	grGetDepUsers.query();
	
	while (grGetDepUsers.next()) {
		userArray.push(grGetDepUsers.getValue('sys_id'));
	}
	
	users+= userArray.join();
	gs.log("Nikhil 5nd" + userArray.length)
	
	current.setValue('u_users',users);
	current.update();
	
})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2019-04-08 14:52:31</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>a041a63bdba03300e6aeab7dca961916</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Mass Mail - Generate Users</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_a041a63bdba03300e6aeab7dca961916</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2019-04-27 19:33:50</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=a041a63bdba03300e6aeab7dca961916"/></record_update>

	email.setSubject(current.getValue('u_subject'));
